name: Kai Ju Jiu Ji, Wo Wu Gua Zhan Shen
author: 爱豆喵工作室
content: An unspeakable deity descends upon Earth, turning all of humanity into fanatical followers! In this crazed world, Feng Ming loses everything. As the only normal sane person, he decides to reclaim his world, joining forces with the Goddess of Calamity and Misfortune, Si Yuan, and embarks on the path of slaying Gods!Original Webtoon
